name: Politz 2.0
description: Visual melhorado para o forum politz
css: @-moz-document domain("forum.politz.com.br"){body{font-family:Roboto,serif;font-size:15px}.p-header{background:linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(41,52,98,1) 0,rgba(33,101,131,1) 35%,rgba(247,190,22,1) 100%)}.hScroller-action--end,.hScroller-action--start{background:linear-gradient(to right,#d8a91d 66%,rgba(0,102,204,0) 100%)!important}.p-nav{box-shadow:none;background:#f7be16;color:#000;letter-spacing:.2px;box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.p-nav li:hover{color:#eee}.p-navgroup-linkText:hover{color:#eee;animation:fadein .4s}.tabs-tab.is-active{color:#eee!important}.tabs-tab:hover{color:#eee!important}.p-body{background:#293462}.button{color:#000!important;background:#f7be16!important;font-family:Roboto,serif}.button.button--link{color:#000!important}.button-text{color:#000!important}.button--icon--write{border-color:#000!important}.button--cta .button-text{font-weight:600;letter-spacing:.2px;text-transform:uppercase}.button-text:hover{color:#fff!important;animation:fadein .5s}.xb-content-wrapper{background:#293462}.structItem-title{font-size:16px;font-family:"Segoe UI","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,"Fira Sans","Droid Sans",sans-serif}.fa-calendar,.fa-comments,.fa-thumbs-up{color:#f7be16}.p-title-value{font-size:1.4rem;letter-spacing:.1px}.p-description{font-style:italic}.listInline--bullet{margin-top:10px}.message-avatar-wrapper .avatar{border-radius:10%}.hScroller-action--end{background:#f7be16}.message-cell{margin:10px 10px}.structItem-cell--main:hover{background:#555a65}.button.button--cta{border-color:#f7be16!important}.actionBar-action--delete:hover,.actionBar-action--edit:hover,.actionBar-action--mq:hover,.actionBar-action--reaction:hover,.actionBar-action--reply:hover,.actionBar-action--report:hover{text-decoration:none;box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22);transition:box-shadow .8s;transition:color 1s;transition:border .8s;color:#f7be16;border:1px dashed #f7be16;font-weight:700}.button--icon--attach,.button--icon--preview,.button--icon--reply{border-color:#000!important}.reactionsBar{width:100%;text-align:right;float:right;opacity:.8!important}.fr-word-counter{color:#f7be16;margin-top:5px!important}.message-name{font-size:17px;letter-spacing:.5px}.message-userDetails .userTitle{font-style:italic;font-size:13px;color:#f7be16;margin-top:-4px;margin-bottom:8px}.message-cell.message-cell--user{background:#1d1c1c}.message-cell--user{border-top:1px solid #f7be16}.message-threadStarter{background:#216583!important}.fr-submit{background:#f7be16!important;border-color:none;color:#000!important}.ah-gp-icons-container{text-align:center}.bbCodeBlock{border:1px dashed #f7be16}.p-footer--container{background:#293462}.p-footer-default{margin-top:40px;background:#36393f}.p-footer-custom{background:#1f1f1f}@keyframes fadein{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes white{from{color:#fff}to{color:#fff}}}
